title: cant see that much of the map
body:
it seems like other players can see more of the map than i can, i saw it in some streams my friend said aswell that he can see on his own pc more of the map than i can any help ?    

im playing with the resolution 1920x1200

replies.body: This might just be a sort of visual thing going on. I don't believe changing the in-game resolution would give you more sight of the map, since that could give some players a bit of an edge. Even still, you could try changing your in-game res to see if you can get it to look similar to your friends. I'd ask them what res their League is running at and mirror theirs to see what happens.

my game with the resolution 1920x1200 
https://imgur.com/a/AdO3B

and on 1920x1080 
https://imgur.com/a/foJ4C
If you can provide a screenshot of what you're seeing, that would help us determine whether or not what you're seeing is correct.
how can i do that i have a screenshot but how do i send it
Upload the image to an image hosting site such as [imgur](https://imgur.com/?) and post the link here.

The image looks taller on top/bottom, and thinner on the left/right sides on my 1920x1080 screen. What is your screen resolution, and your in game resolution? Could you also try switching to borderless if it's not already on that and see how it looks?
my screen resolution is 1920x1200 and ingame aswell
